title: Thought lines and other shapes
excerpt: We all know people who tend to talk (and think) in circles. Incessantly rambling in loops. Never arriving anywhere.

children.text: We all know people who tend to talk (and think) in circles. Incessantly rambling in loops. Never arriving anywhere.
And then there are the unknowing squares. People so entrenched in their own doctrines and precepts they box themselves in their own borders.
It takes work to cut through the noise. To keep your thinking clean and sequential and straight.
